about_the_game:
Add some more epicness to your games’ soundtracks with Hero Music Collection! Ayato Sound Create has crafted 25 BGMs to help you find the perfect tracks for a variety of scenes!

To get your players excited to play right from the get-go, why not pick one of the energetic tunes as your title screen music? When those songs pop up again during battles or scenes, your players will know something important is going on!

With a variety of instruments used, you can easily give different parts of your cities their own tracks to put your players in the right mindset for where they are. An upbeat bass and guitar would be great for an outdoor market or port, while a quirky electronic song is perfect for an underground bar. Play soft piano and strings during your game’s calmer moments, when your heroes finally have a chance to catch their breath and share some secret feelings with each other. And when your heroes finally face the final boss, give them pulsing drums to get them ready for the fight of their lives!

Features:

* 25 songs
* mp3, ogg, m4a, m4a loop and wav files included

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
